txt.en: You have come across captive Rohirrim that have been tortured and caged in Gurz-shâpol. You should rescue them from their captors.
Captured Rohirrim can be found throughout Gurz-shâpol.\n\nYou have come across captive Rohirrim that have been tortured and caged in Gurz-shâpol. You should rescue them from their captors.
You have not rescued all of the Rohirrim from the Orcs.
You have rescued all of the Rohirrim in Gurz-shâpol, sparing them a horrific fate.

Screams echo through the air in Gurz-shâpol, hinting that the Rashat-hai have captured Rohirrim and inflict grievous torture on them even now. You would do well to find and rescue these unfortunate people before the Orcs can raise the lash once more.
'Thank you, my friend... I know not how much longer I would have survived.'
'Freedom! Because of you, I shall no longer feel the lash upon my skin!'
'I thought I was going to die here... I hope my legs can bear me from this cave.'
'The Orcs were preparing to sacrifice us all... Thank you, my friend.'
You have rescued all of the Rohirrim in Gurz-shâpol, sparing them a horrific fate at the hands of the Rashat-hai. Their families in Underharrow will be glad to look upon them once more.
The Rashat-hai of Gurz-shâpol have taken a fascination in sacrificing their captives to the Great Eye, and delight in torturing them until they can endure no more.
